Subject: Major Incident Notification:  www.faces.ae is down
--------------------------------------------------






 

Major Incident Notification:  www.faces.ae <https://www.faces.ae/>  is down

______________________________________________________________________________

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 08 Feb, 25

Time: 11:00 AM GST

 

Dear Colleagues,

Please be advised, www.faces.ae <http://www.faces.ae/>  is currently down. However, the mobile app remains fully functional and other Faces sites remain operational. 

Our tech teams are actively investigating and working to resolve the issue.
 If you require any assistance during this time, please raise a support ticket via the following link: OneReach Support Portal <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/> . 
Alternatively, you can contact us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or use the chatbot available on the support portal.
Thank you for your patience and cooperation.



If you have any questions, please reach out to the IT Service Desk via One reach Link <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/a/dashboard/default>
